verses.verse: And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof; it was <S%H7251>foursquare<s%>; and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of it; the <S%H7161>horns<s%> thereof were of the same: and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, the <S%H5518>pots<s%>, and the <S%H3257>shovels<s%>, and the <S%H4219>basons<s%>, and the <S%H4207>fleshhooks<s%>, and the <S%H4289>firepans<s%>: all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof <S%H6213>made<s%> he of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4345>grate<s%> of <S%H7568%H4639>network<s%> under the <S%H3749>compass<s%> thereof <S%H4295>beneath<s%> unto the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of it.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H4345>grate<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, to be <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

And he <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to <S%H5375>bear<s%> it withal; he <S%H6213>made<s%> the altar <S%H5014>hollow<s%> with <S%H3871>boards<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H3653>foot<s%> of it of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, of the <S%H4759>lookingglasses<s%> of the women <S%H6633>assembling<s%>, which <S%H6633>assembled<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%>: on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> were of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>:

Their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%>, and their <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%>; the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> were of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And for the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> the hangings were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%>; the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And for the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> were <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%>; the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
And for the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the one <S%H3802>side<s%> of the gate were <S%H2568%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%>.

And for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, on this hand and that hand, were <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2568%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%>.
All the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> were of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

And the <S%H134>sockets<s%> for the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass<s%>; the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and the <S%H6826>overlaying<s%> of their <S%H7218>chapiters<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and all the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> were <S%H2836>filleted<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H7551%H4639>needlework<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>: and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%>, and the <S%H6967>height<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>.

And their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H702>four<s%>; their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H6826>overlaying<s%> of their <S%H7218>chapiters<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
And all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, were of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.

¶ <S%H428>This<s%> is the <S%H6485>sum<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, even of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, as it was <S%H6485>counted<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H6213>made<s%> all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And with him was <S%H171>Aholiab<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, an <S%H2796>engraver<s%>, and a cunning <S%H2803>workman<s%>, and an <S%H7551>embroiderer<s%> in <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and in <S%H713>purple<s%>, and in <S%H8144%H8438>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>.

All the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H6213>occupied<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> in all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, even the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8573>offering<s%>, was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

And the <S%H3701>silver<s%> of them that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>:

A <S%H1235>bekah<s%> for every <S%H1538>man<s%>, that is, <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, for every one that <S%H5674>went<s%> to be <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> men.

And of the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were <S%H3332>cast<s%> the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H6532>vail<s%>; an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, a <S%H3603>talent<s%> for a <S%H134>socket<s%>.

And of the <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> shekels he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2053>hooks<s%> for the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>chapiters<s%>, and <S%H2836>filleted<s%> them.
And the <S%H5178>brass<s%> of the <S%H8573>offering<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.

And therewith he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H134>sockets<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and the <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4345>grate<s%> for it, and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>,

And the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
